MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the TD15 postcode area of Berwick Upon Tweed. We did not know in advance there would be a power cut, and are working to get supplies restored. So far we have identified grounded overhead lines near to Norham Station due to onsite difficulties we now expect your supply to be restored by 1am. We understand that being without power is frustrating and please be assured we will restore your supply as soon as we possibly can. If for any reason this information changes then we will update this message. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 9:18pm on Monday, 16 November 2020
